edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints

Class ImageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs180a.pocketpoints.ImageUtils

  • public class ImageUtils
extends Object
    Uninstantiable class with static methods for decoding a scaled image.
    Author:
    ajkwak@users.noreply.github.com (AJ Parmidge)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Bitmap loadImage(String imagePath, int targetWidth, int targetHeight)
      Load the image from the given file path such that the returned image's dimensions are as similar as possible to the given dimensions.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadImage

        public static Bitmap loadImage(String imagePath,
               int targetWidth,
               int targetHeight)
        Load the image from the given file path such that the returned image's dimensions are as similar as possible to the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        imagePath - the file path from which to load the image
        targetWidth - the maximum width that the returned image should have
        targetHeight - the minimum width that the returned image should have
        Returns:
        the scaled image
